oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of Richard Arthur Robeson and others at his 4-chair barbershop
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This black and white photograph documents the interior of Richard Arthur Roberson's barbershop , Etowah, Tennessee, 1921. Robeson is pictured at the far left, standing. He died of lead poisoning in 1934 due to injury he suffered in the World War I, 1914-1918, with the 117th Inf. Regt., 30th Div.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Robeson, Richard Arthur
World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
